  • Uses of TOADInformation in PamguardMVC.toad

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TOADInformation
    GenericTOADCalculator.getTOADInformation(List<PamDataUnit> dataUnits, double sampleRate, int channelMap, SnapshotGeometry geometry)
    Generate TOAD information for a whole load of data units (or just one - maybe needs a simpler list if there is only one to avoid having to make lots of lists of just one data unit !)
    Note that any fancy operations that involve waveform envelopes, etc, are generally handled by the FFTOrganiser.
    TOADInformation
    TOADCalculator.getTOADInformation(List<PamDataUnit> dataUnits, double sampleRate, int channelMap, SnapshotGeometry geometry)
    Generate TOAD information for a while load of data units (or just one - maybe needs a simpler list if there is only one to avoid having to make lots of lists of just one data unit !)
